headline: Verisk Analytics (NasdaqGS:VRSK) Partners With OneClick To Enhance Insurance Claims Solutions
summary: Verisk Analytics (NasdaqGS:VRSK) recently saw a price movement of 4.5% in the last quarter, coinciding with significant developments like the integration of OneClick Data, Inc. with its Xactware platform. This integration enhances claims solutions, potentially bolstering Verisk's position in the insurance sector. Additionally, OneClick Code's inclusion in Verisk's ecosystem brings direct access to comprehensive building code data, streamlining the claims process. Broader market trends showed...
